This game reminds me of how I killed my wife and her 3 friends at their last book club meeting. I thought I was just playing the Trapper, but the police said I was a "Brutal" and "Sick" murderer (thanks for the compliment btw).
Let's just say those police officers did not know I had offered up Mori just seconds before they came. 

Needless to say, I am a free man and I am selling a used ford fiesta at a low low price. Will only meet up at night though. No trades!
10/10 Would kill my wife again - IGN

Oyunda oyunu açmamı etkileyen bir hata var ve şu an oyunu açamıyorum steam destek sanırım bu oyuna bakmıyo ve kendi destek birimi yetersiz. Oyunu 2 veya 3 kere silip yüklemiş olmama rağmen hala aynı hatayı alıyorum düzeltme yolunu bulamadım ve farklı mecralarda aynı hatanın çözümünü bulamayan fazla miktarda kişi var böyle bi soruna bile yapımcı etkili bir çözüm bulmuyorsa bu oyunu sattıktan sonra unuttukları anlamına gelir o yüzden tavsiye etmiyorum.
This game gave me an STD

there I was drinking my choccy moo moo juice when all of a sudden I heard this loud heartbeat. Honestly, I thought it was mine for a while that was till I saw fat drunk clown chasing this black chick. I was impressed by how fast that meat pile was running. It reminded me about the time when my local McDonalds had a deal on the big mac. I just remember the smell of those sweaty sumo wrestlers covered in fry grease. *gags* They caused an earthquake when they all started running to that damned place. Anyway, this clown was shaking this bottle while he ran, almost like he was trying to roofie this poor girls drink.  Then, the fat ass just threw it at her. at first, I was like damn chungus over here got an arm but I soon realized that muthafuker had a knife. now I'm not sayin he's a bad guy or nuthin but chasing a black chick with a knife not to cash money of him. So, I decided we were gonna have a talk >:( I ran up to this 6ft 3in, 500-pound sack of potatoes with legs and asked why he was chasing her. his pea-sized brain finally came up with his dogshit answer 3 and a half min later with and I quote "my life is like a videogame, trying hard to beat the stage" I just smacked is triple chin havin ass and ran away. Who the fuck knew Mr potato head was an Olympic athlete. he caught up to me faster than Hillarys deleted email caught up to her to bite her in the ass. Anyway, he grabbed my sweet tight ass off the ground and put me on the hook like a fish little fish. kinda sad tho I didn't even get to finish my choccy moo moo juice.
刺激

Sometimes toxic people play this game. Not everyone is toxic, though. I wish there was an easier way to get rid of the people who are toxic. Devs seem to promote that killers play toxic, even during promotions where you can get more blood points for playing and staying home instead of going out and spreading the rona. They even promote toxicity with some of their challenges. Remember to look through the bad apples to find the good ones. There are a lot of friends to make that play DBD. I hope they change their mindset for killers, and survivors too. I also hope they do something about the people that get reported for being toxic, especially in before- and after-game chats.

Ein cooles spiel. Mit drei freunden lässt sich eine gute Survivor Party spielen und solo ist der Killer angenehmer, aber jedem seine Geschmacksache.

Gaaaanz großer Minus punkt an dem Spiel ist, das es verbugt wie nochmal was ist. 
Ich habe einen guten PC der auch was aushält und höhere Spiele problemlos schafft, aber dieses Spiel hängt sich so oft im Loading screen auf, sodass ich jedes mal meine gesetzten Add ons&co. verliere, ganz oft kam bei mir die Meldung das Dateien fehlen, die darf ich dann auch nochmal runterladen, was ne Ewigkeit dauert, ganz plötzlich stürzt das Spiel ab, ob nun Ingame oder im Menü. 

Also die Macher haben eine coole Idee gehabt, mit gutem Design und allem aber sie müssen dringend an ihrem System arbeiten, dass das Spiel nicht 3 mal am Tag abstürzt oder irgendeinen nervigen Bug hat

L'équipe qui s'occupe de ce jeu poste toujours des nouveaux DLC, des mises à jour régulières ainsi que des hotfix et ceux ci sont toujours très qualitatifs, rien à dire sur ce point. La raison pour laquelle je ne recommande pas ce jeu est simple : le camp est prôné par les développeurs ce qui détruit le plaisir de jouer pour tous. La communauté de ce jeu est TOXIQUE, il n'y a pas d'autres mots pour mieux la décrire, entre le FOCUS, le CAMP et les INSULTES en fin de partie, on n'en finit plus de se faire HARCELER parce qu'on a simplement été meilleur que les autres. Et quand on demande à l'équipe qui s'occupe de ce jeu pourquoi ils ne tentent rien afin de réduire ces problèmes, ils répondent simplement que "si on n'aime pas leur jeu, alors il ne faut plus y jouer". Certes, il y a des gens toxiques partout. Mais la moindre des choses serait d'au moins essayer de contrer cela, à mes yeux c'est l'une des bases d'un jeu.
Dead by Daylight a un potentiel monstre, mais comparé à l'inactivité des développeurs face à la toxicité des joueurs, je ne peux recommander ce jeu.

Words cannot express how much i despise Raccoon city police station which, in my opinion, should not exist. Despite low standards this degenerate piece of filth map does not deserve to be in Dead By Daylight. I don't know who thought it would be a good idea to implement this absolute dogshit structure into the game, knowing all its mechanics. Presence of this pathetic construct in game fills me with inner pain and disapointment.

I Feel like the devs are really encouraging killers to camp. Why buff game slowdown perks, and increase generator completion time? Wouldn't it be better just to nerf toolboxes and prove thyself? apparently not. Update was addressed to prevent killers from camping and tunneling, but right now, sadly, hooking a survivor and standing in front of them untill they die is the most efficient strategy.
Fun game if you know how to play. Fun if you know how to loop the killer.

Das spielen macht nur zum teil Spaß, da das Spiel sehr viele Fehler hat.
Der größte Minuspunkt ist aber das Matchmaking! (wenn es überhaupt eines gibt ...)
Entweder die Spiele sind so einfach, dass sie nicht den erwarteten Spielspaß bringen, oder die Spiele sind so schwer, dass die nur frustrieren. Dazwischen findet man selten etwas.
Im Allgemeninen ist das Konzept der Spiels sehr gut aber die Umsetzung eher schlecht. Es gibt in dieser Spielekategorie einige Spiele, die dahingehend besser funktionieren und dadurch auch mehr Spaß mit sich bringen.

Игра полная хрень, ошибки лезут иззо всех щелей, не пожелаю такое никому, с такими багами в такой шаражке как ЦАТЭК не приняли бы как курсовой даже, полная херь, потрачена куча нервов на решение разных проблем. При этом разрабы пиздяT про хорошо проделанную работу, игре 4 года, а она 4 года как дерьмо, хотя нет, это и есть дерьмо высокого класса.
